name: ArioSmart
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can turn on/off your lights simply by giving orders to Alexa. Alexa can show you the stream from supported devices. 
1) Download the App from App Store or Google Play Store, 
2) Create a new account and log in, 
3) Link your account to Alexa
4) Control your devices and scenes
